modName: Spyro the Dragon - Odahviing texture replacement
summary: This is just a retexture odahviing to look like Spyro the Dragon.
descriptionHtml:
*Update added a darker version as requested.

This is a retexture i did of odahviing to based of Spyro the Dragon. I was inspired by AurianaValoria1 [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4008] Odahviing replacement project[/url]  (definatly check it out as she has some alot of different retextures) spyro retexture, but it seemed off so I made my own. This is my first time retexturing and I will try to add better details when I can. This only contains the odahviing texture I will try to redo the LOD texture on tuesday.  

Just drop data into your skyrim folder.
author: deius23
